title: Fix the Battlecast - Mecha teams!
body:
Has anyone else noticed that the skin team "Battlecast" has 6 options, which cover all roles, top/mid(ap)/adcs/supp/jg's.... and team Mecha only has 4 members, all melee.... You need to fix the scales in the robots which transform teams :P as it stands, autobo.... i mean mecha's.... dont have an adc or ap mid 



{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: Don't worry! Riot probably has already planned this. I would love to see a new zed skin tbh. The project skin zed ain't even that good I prefer the shockblade over it. Project zed's animation doesn't feel smooth at all

Yeah im not a big fan of the project team skins. Was good on paper, would be nice to play against a full 5 man project team, but.... 

i wasn't sold on it either.
